name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Sister Location!
name_original: Five Nights at Freddy's: Sister Location!
description:
It will glitch on night 1 so just hit the green flag button at the top of the screen beside the pause button then hit the number two 

People have been having issues so this was probably also messed up by the HTML conversion but I really don't care enough to try and fix it. 

On the title screen, you can press the number keys 1-5 to change the night. Note that doing so will also set your location to the start of that night. 

You may also use the R key on the title screen to reset the night.
